means: （墨西哥人和中美洲人大量饮用的）龙舌兰酒

word_mean: 龙舌兰汁酒：在墨西哥及中美洲由龙舌兰汁制造的一种发酵饮料

sentence.Network_en: Mexican plant used especially for making pulque the source of the colorless Mexican liquor mescal.
sentence.Network_cn: 墨西哥的一种植物,通常被用来制作龙舌兰酒——墨西哥的一种无色的麦斯卡尔酒.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 请大家总结一些酒的说法？谢谢？_爱问知识人 ... Pastis 法国茴香酒 Pulque 龙舌兰酒 rum 兰姆酒.

list.abs: 套穿连衣裙 a pullover dress龙舌兰白兰地 pulque brandy（心脏等）搏动 pulsate

derivation.yuyuan_name: via American Spanish from Nahuatl puliúhki 'decomposed'

means.word_mean: 1. fermented Mexican drink from juice of various agave plants especially the maguey

auth_sentence.content: On any given afternoon, pierced, black-clad youth crowd around tables sharing mugs of pulque from pink and blue plastic buckets.
